channel.title: Is that Squel of fortune crap rigged?
channel.description: I mean..after like 25spins it is still impossible to get a decent item.. this has to be rigged right? Fuck buying spins.

item.title: Is that Squel of fortune crap rigged?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Well I just won a fish mask… the only thing I’ve won thats worth over 50k+ i guess… to tell you the truth i didnt even know the fish mask was worth anything… so yeah until i randomly checked the price… 540k

Read full topic
item.source: Is that Squel of fortune crap rigged?

item.title: Is that Squel of fortune crap rigged?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

It’s like any other gambling game you have a low chance to win big, but you still win most of the time with these smaller but still valued prizes.

Read full topic
item.source: Is that Squel of fortune crap rigged?

item.title: Is that Squel of fortune crap rigged?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:19, topic:443531”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=546210.msg4008069#msg4008069 date=1338864855]

It’s rigged, notice when you use your spins that when the light thing scrolls over a non-rare item it takes a longer time to move to the next item in sequence compared to a very rare or rare item. You can test this when your spinner slows down.
[/quote]Look at the spinner. The yellow and white sections are notably larger than the red, which is why it looks like it just skips over them.

it doesn’t skip over them, it just spends less time on that ticker than it would on a non-rare ticker.[/quote]
Exactly

If you honestly think it’s rigged, you’re pretty stupid

Read full topic
item.source: Is that Squel of fortune crap rigged?

[/quote]

item.source: Is that Squel of fortune crap rigged?

item.title: Is that Squel of fortune crap rigged?
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:2, topic:443531”]I GOT hacked so I quit entirely. I just logged on. My bank was gone D:
I was standing in the bank, while i was supposed to be in catherby
and my bank got stolen
and no it’s not rigged
A friend of mine on rs, a while back paid for 75 spins and all he got was shit like lamps, some rune items and mostly cowhides and 50 coins[/quote]

ONCE i played rs and then i quit
cause its so bad
rs is bad even with cash and stats
but yes
the wheel sucks

edit:

assuming only one decent item appears each spin, with the random chance of it having no good items/two or more, you have a 7.7% chance of getting it (1/13 chance). this doesn’t mean that every 13 spins you are guaranteed to get a good item because each individual spin has its own chance of luck. This is also why you’re not guaranteed to make your cash back by betting your bank away on the flower game/whatever the fuck they’re using now.

tl;dr you’re a moron if you think that buying more spins increases the chance of getting a good item significantly

Read full topic
